tool.name: Split.abund
tool.description: Separate sequences into rare and abundant groups
tool.command: mothur_wrapper.py --cmd='split.abund' #import re, os.path --result='^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'$logfile ## --result='^mothur.\S+\.logfile$:'$logfile,'^\S+\.abund\.list$:'$abund_list,'^\S+\.rare\.list$:'$rare_list,'^\S+\.rare\.accnos$:'$rare_accnos,'^\S+\.abund\.accnos$:'$abund_accnos --outputdir='$logfile.extra_files_path' #set datasets = [] #if $as_datasets.__str__ == "yes": --datasetid='$logfile.id' --new_file_path='$__new_file_path__' --new_datasets='^\S+?\.((unique|[0-9.]+)\.(rare|abund)\.fasta)$:${fasta.ext}','^\S+?\.((unique|[0-9.]+)\.(rare|abund)\.groups)$:groups','^\S+?\.((unique|[0-9.]+)\.(rare|abund)\.accnos)$:accnos' #end if --fasta="$fasta" #set datasets = $datasets + ["'" + $re.sub(r'(^.*)\.(.*?)$',r'^\1.(.*\.fasta)$',$os.path.basename($fasta.__str__)) + ":" + $fasta.ext + "'"] #if $search.type == "list": --list="$search.input" #set datasets = $datasets + ["'" + $re.sub(r'(^.*)\.(.*?)$',r'^\1.(.*\.list)$',$os.path.basename($search.input.__str__)) + ":list'"] #if $accnos: #set datasets = $datasets + ["'" + $re.sub(r'(^.*)\.(.*?)$',r'^\1.(.*\.accnos)$',$os.path.basename($search.input.__str__)) + ":accnos'"] #end if #if $search.label.__str__ != "None" and len($search.label.__str__) > 0: --label="$search.label" #end if #elif $search.type == "name": --name="$search.input" #set datasets = $datasets + ["'" + $re.sub(r'(^.*)\.(.*?)$',r'^\1.(.*\.names)$',$os.path.basename($search.input.__str__)) + ":names'"] #if $accnos: #set datasets = $datasets + ["'" + $re.sub(r'(^.*)\.(.*?)$',r'^\1.(.*\.accnos)$',$os.path.basename($search.input.__str__)) + ":accnos'"] #end if #else --count="$search.input" #end if --cutoff="$cutoff" #if $split.type == 'yes': #if $split.group.__str__ != "None" and len($split.group.__str__) > 0: --group="$split.group" #set datasets = $datasets + ["'" + $re.sub(r'(^.*)\.(.*?)$',r'^\1.(.*\.groups)$',$os.path.basename($split.group.__str__)) + ":groups'"] #end if #if $split.groups.__str__ != "None" and len($split.groups.__str__) > 0: --groups="$split.groups" #end if #end if "$accnos" #if $as_datasets.__str__ == "yes": --datasetid='$logfile.id' --new_file_path='$__new_file_path__' --new_datasets=#echo ','.join($datasets) #end if

param.name: label
param.label: label - OTU Labels
param.help: Select OTU Labels to filter out all but selected labels

param.name: cutoff
param.label: cutoff - Cutoff parameter is used to qualify what is abundant and rare.

param.name: type
param.label: Parse a group file into abundant and rare groups?

param.name: groups
param.label: groups - Group Selection (all used if none are selected)

param.name: accnos
param.label: accnos - Produce rare and abundant Accession outputs

param.name: as_datasets
param.label: Create a new history dataset for each label

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The split.abund_ command reads a fasta file and a list_ or a name_ file and splits the sequences into rare and abundant groups.
.. _list: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/List_file .. _name: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Name_file .. _split.abund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Split.abund
